1568379812_14APsrL3Vnc8mCdWoXwHh3HM7pzeU.body:
> We can ditch the part all humans have from our consideration, because, well, its pretty irrelevant. We can also drop the part that varies from person to person because we are talking about the context of races here, even though im not saying that it cannot allow any individual to rise about his peers.

Yeah, let's ditch a very important point that contradicts your idea. How do you differentiate between races, and what's the difference RELATIVE to the whole (of which a huge portion you chose to ditch). Besides, a slightly smaller genetic distance to apes doesn't necessarily prove inferiority. We have a pretty small genetic distance to pigs as well, how do you explain that?

Sorry dude, without explaining what those genes do and how they affect us relative to other genes, there is no way for you to make your point.

> even after somebody brought them things like modern technology or medicine.

Well, you don't seem to understand it very well.

> With most races it would be a difficult to objectively point at any of them as the best one, however one of them very clearly falls behind all the others - niggers

They did just fine 3-4 thousand years ago relative to everybody else if I'm not mistaking, Back then, genetics wasn't much different at all from what it is today. It's mainly things like cultural/economical differences that judge how successful a nation or race is. Generally black people are at a disadvantaged state because of various reasons. Had things been different then maybe you would've been the nigger, and arrogant blacks would've made similarly stupid points about you.
